body:
Newport Beach, CA, based Investment company Alpha Cubed Investments, LLC buys NAS:AAPL, NYSE:BMY, NYSE:ETN, ARCA:AMJ, ARCA:MBB, ARCA:IEF, NYSE:KO, NAS:VCSH, NAS:GOOGL, NYSE:TGT, sells WFC, SO, HD, F, GILD during the 3-months ended 2016-12-31, according to the most recent filings of the investment company, Alpha Cubed Investments, LLC. As of 2016-12-31, Alpha Cubed Investments, LLC owns 185 stocks with a total value of $406 million. These are the details of the buys and sells.



For the details of Alpha Cubed Investments, LLC's stock buys and sells, go to http://www.gurufocus.com/StockBuy.php?GuruName=Alpha+Cubed+Investments%2C+LLC
